content: learn how to make a simple yet beautiful crochet water lily granny square this is a digital pdf file with a pattern written in english including materials suggestions a crochet diagram and written instructions to help you along the way but in case of any troubles feel free to dm me and i m sure i will be able to help you ========================= to make this item you will be able to know some basic crocheting skills including - front post treble_crochet - single/half-double/double_crochet - magic_ring - chains us terms
